get_node.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ===========================================
00002 !
00003 !           GET_NODE
00004 !
00005 !   Function to return node number in hash table
00006 !   from key
00007 !   
00008 !
00009 ! ===========================================
00010 
00011 function key2node(keyin)
00012 
00013   use treevars
00014 
00015   implicit none
00016   integer :: key2node
00017   integer*8 :: keyin
00018   integer :: nodeout
00019   integer :: cell_addr, link_addr
00020   logical :: resolved
00021 
00022   cell_addr = IAND( keyin, hashconst)     ! cell address hash function
00023 
00024   if ( htable( cell_addr )%key == keyin ) then
00025      key2node = htable( cell_addr )%node      ! Keys match -> found entry
00026      return
00027   else
00028      resolved = .false.
00029      link_addr = cell_addr
00030 
00031      do while (  .not. resolved .or. link_addr >= maxaddress )       ! Repeat until keys match or run out of links
00032         link_addr = htable(link_addr)%link    ! Next linked entry
00033         if ( htable( link_addr )%key == keyin ) then
00034            key2node = htable( link_addr )%node      ! Keys match -> found entry
00035            return
00036         endif
00037      end do
00038      ! Not resolved - something wrong: invalid key or #-table wrong
00039      write (*,*) 'Key not resolved in KEY2NODE: check #-table and key list'
00040      write (*,'(a5,o20,a12,i15)') 'Key #: ',keyin,' Address: ',cell_addr
00041 
00042      ! stop
00043   endif
00044 end function key2node
